PrecisReappointment of BARBARA HALL, of Toronto, Ontario, as Special Advisor to the Minister of Justice and Attorney General of Canada and to the Solicitor General of Canada, and National Chair, Steering Committee for the National Strategy on Community Safety and Crime Prevention, to hold office during pleasure for a term of one year, effective May 26, 2000.
